TopicTitle: Choose your super power, then have it trivialized

Articles.Content:
Granted, but you fast forward along with it.

The power of metamorphosis!

You can never become the same thing twice, including your original form.

Photosynthesis

But you'll gonna starve every night.

Telekinesis!

You are now a tree. Have fun!

Mind control.

You control the mind of a Penguin in Antartica.

The Force.

You only think you have the force, you are really hallucinating because of an infection of Midi-chlorian.

Density Control.

But you can only make things super dense, and only when they're resting on top of your head.

Invisibility!

Granted ,but it has a cool down ,and your not Indivisible while moving.

Able to manipulate space ,and time.

Granted, but everyone has it. It's called life.

Super speed!

Granted, you move super speed compared to snail.

500 IQ!

Granted compared to a baby

I wish to see in the spectrum of gama rays.

You can only see things that kill you instantly

Infinitely powerful love

well lets say every female on earht chases you.

I wish that I can have 2 hearts to be super active.

You become so active that you have a heart attack.

I want to download the whole internet in a 2GB pendrive.

well it doesn't end well for that en.

The ability to turn into a machine.

You become this:

I want to become a gas.

granted but your lighter than air so you float out into space.

The ability to produce helium.

You turn into a star and burn up.

The ability to become a cat whenever I please.

you cant turn back

the ability to turn other people into cows

the ability to petrify anything as long as its a spider

Uhhh that would still be nice!

You can turn other people into cows, but only people you don't know and will never meet or see.

I want to have the abillity to shoot lasers from my eyes

Cracked.com has something to say:

...your eyes are constantly making tiny motions called microsaccades. These motions are completely involuntary, and can change your line of sight by up to a full degree. That may seem like an insignificant number, but it adds up over distance -- and it royally screws over your laser-eye power.

Infinite flying at my will.

But only when the humidity is 80% or higher and the air temp is 30 celcius.

manual control over my internal temperature.

Well, you decide to see what 0 K feels like, and your internal organs freeze

The ability to go into and explore imaginary worlds in my mind.

Edited June 28, 2013 by Flymetothemun
Megaderp 9001

People will think that you're crazy because of stuff you're sharing them, basically you're now living in your imagination.

Ability to blend to surrounding.

It only works when your surroundings look exactly like you.

The ability to make it so every single family member of mine doesn't steal my turkey on Thanksgiving.
